Principal Types

&bull External

The external sucks up vapors, odors and grease from the stove leading and expels them outside, via an air duct. This makes this form of range hood really reliable, while it is relatively much more costly than the internal hoods.

&bull Internal

Selection hoods that are internally vented suck up the tainted air and make the most of a mechanism manufactured of activated charcoal filters to get rid of odor and grease before it is vented and re-circulated into the kitchen. &bull Combination
